full_summary:
### Notice of Tender

#### Announcement

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites offers for the purchase of one (1) shallow water craft vessel for use by the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) Conservation and Protection program in Pictou, Nova Scotia. The successful bidder must demonstrate compliance with Transport Canada requirements.

#### Tender Details

| Category | Details |
| --- | --- |
| **Contract Reference** | WS4145802405 |
| **Publication Date** | August 17, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | September 6, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | September 20, 2023 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | N/A |

#### Goods and Services Requirements

The successful bidder must provide a shallow water craft vessel capable of operating in both fresh and saltwater environments. The vessel must meet the standard boating equipment requirements specified by Transport Canada and be equipped with the following:

- Standard boating equipment as required by Transport Canada
- Specified accessories
- Fitted trailer

#### Tender Evaluation

Tenders will be evaluated on the basis of price. The lowest-priced bid will be deemed the preferred bid.

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the requirements of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

- **LMartin** ( Lisa M. Martin, PSPC)
- **Email**: lisa.m.martin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice URL

For the tender document, please visit the Ariba discovery website:
- http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17194495?extsite=MTcxOTQ0OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that all bids must be submitted electronically using the notice URL provided above.

#### Closing Date and Time

September 6, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT

This notice was updated on August 17, 2023.

Please acknowledge receipt of this notice by sending an email to [notifications@discovery.ariba.com](mailto:notifications@discovery.ariba.com).
